creator: jeffaschenk@gmail.com
text:
v8.5.14 Tomcat zip Download is Missing 'lib' contents!

Download is not usable.

Please advise.

Thanks,
Jeff Schenk

The fresh copy I just downloaded from the apache.claz.org mirror certainly contains all the expected files under apache-tomcat-8.5.14/lib, so you either unzipped it incorrectly or the mirror you were using is broken.

Which mirror did you use?
creator: chuck.caldarale@unisys.com
jeffaschenk@gmail.com
text:
I used: http://mirror.metrocast.net/apache/ that appears to have a broken archive.  I am able to pull from the primary mirror you had specified.

Many thanks,
Jeff

creator: jeffaschenk@gmail.com
text:
Oops, I attempted to your the mirror you specified: http://apache.claz.org/ and that has a missing lib elements as well.

I went to http://apache.cs.utah.edu/ and that has a complete archive. 

Thanks,
Jeff

creator: chuck.caldarale@unisys.com
text:
(In reply to Jeff A Schenk from comment #2)
> I used: http://mirror.metrocast.net/apache/ that appears to have a broken
> archive.  I am able to pull from the primary mirror you had specified.

Downloading 8.5.14 from that site works fine for me.
